divs: sighting detailsi caught this triangle,boomerang,cresent shaped ufo while flying home to chicago from dfw on 5\8\2010. at around 6:23pm cdt i notice a grey silouette of what at first looked like a cigar hanging in the sky. i immediatelly took out my camera out from my carry on and first took photos then i recorded video. i have seen this craft numerous times now, i am pretty sure it is the same craft that was hit by lightning in my other video easter sunday. after the ufo flew away the airplane i was in flew over a nuclear reactor. i had no idea where i was exactly. i believe near the illinois border flying north toward chicago. cut and paste link below for video and photos. thank you http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=1wjtfpsvcjs
Summary: UFO FLYING NEAR NUCLEAR REACTOR 08 MAY 2010.
